AffiliateManager.presaleMint (/unique_chucks/14/0x063425e215701d2761a9065e647fa98f209b4ddd.sol#741-763) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_amountmvn) (/unique_chucks/14/0x063425e215701d2761a9065e647fa98f209b4ddd.sol#757)

AffiliateManager.join (/unique_chucks/14/0x063425e215701d2761a9065e647fa98f209b4ddd.sol#775-839) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-affiliateTree.addMember(msg.sender,_referrer) (/unique_chucks/14/0x063425e215701d2761a9065e647fa98f209b4ddd.sol#814-815)
